channel.title: Comments for page "Metal Idol"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Metal Idol"

item.title: New Items
item.content:encoded:
Dont know how to edit wiki, hope this helps

Kaiju Victory: Your Village has defeated Metal Idol! Their show gets REALLY weird, and they forget why they are here! Quetz and divreon have received Sad Robot! Terri stops by to toss a Sad Robot to Toshiro for doing a total of 11183 Damage! Your Village receives the Upgrade Crazy Fans!

permanent
Sad Robot- +50% Friend Points

Village Upgrade
Crazy Fans- +10% contract prices

item.title: Key
item.content:encoded:
wow. talk about a blast from the past.

this Kaiju is based on "Key the Metal Idol" an anime series from the mid 90's. the picture is even of here.

really bad at editing the wiki, so I'll just put this info here, and let sombody else do it.
